name: TR Productions
description:
Since 1947, TR Productions has been one of New England's leading business communications and production companies, specializing in the production of video presentations, interactive web presentations, business meetings, collateral and web design, and multimedia screen shows.
We specialize in understanding your message, and converting your content into a vibrant and effective tour de force in the appropriate medium. When you need results-oriented business communications, we help you inform, persuade, motivate and recognize.
We are a talented team of designers, writers, photographers, editors, producers and technical support. Whether we are producing an entire meeting, a video, an interactive presentation, a print piece, an "on-screen" presentation or a scientific poster, TR Productions' internal controls guarantee critical attention to your communications objectives.
We are business-to-business specialists, with emphasis on corporate video, web development & interactive media, business meetings, print & branding development, presentations & screen shows.
When you need results-oriented business communications, we can help you inform, persuade, motivate and recognize. We take the time to learn your business issues so that we understand both the context and content of your message. This higher level of service results in an attention to detail and an unmatched responsiveness to customer needs.
